original_text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do? he will come and destroy the husbandmen, and will give the vineyard unto others.
korean_text: 포도원 주인이 어떻게 하겠느냐 와서 그 농부들을 진멸하고 포도원을 다른 사람들에게 주리라

sentences.original_text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do?
he will come and destroy the husbandmen
and will give the vineyard unto others
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 포도원을 다른 사람들에게 줄 것입니다
